p: Despite these limitations, this is the first investigation to reveal the transmission structure among older people in China using an integration of molecular, clinical, and demographic data. These findings suggest that older people play an important role in local transmission, and as a previous survey suggested, limited knowledge about HIV-1 results in a lack of motivation to seek testing [ 35]. Therefore, the contribution of older people may be underestimated to some extent. Importantly, it is urgent that more tailored interventions be made and implemented. Otherwise, the treatment of older HIV-1 infected people will pose a great challenge in the future.
